resources:
Quiz World
//first question --- Elephant What is the name of this animal? //4 answers Elephant Rhino Zebra Antilope
//second question --- Elephant Elephants lives in...? //4 answers Ocean Mountain Desert Plains
//third question --- Elephant Elephants mostly eat...? //4 answers Meat Fish Plants Insects
//fourth question --- Elephant It is mostly known for? //4 answers Swimming Nocturnality Tusks Fear of mice
//fifth question --- Elephant Why do elephants flap their ears? //4 answers cool down To defend To play catch bugs
//first question --- Zebra What is the name of this animal? //4 answers Horse Donkey Zebra StripeHorse
//second question --- Zebra Zebras lives in...? //4 answers Ocean Savanna Swamp Plains
//third question --- Zebra Zebras mostly eat...? //4 answers Birds Fish Plants Insects
//fourth question --- Zebra It is mostly known for? //4 answers Height Speed Stripes Riding
//fifth question -- Zebra Why can Zebras not be domesticated? //4 answers No one tried not family friendly High breeding time special diet
//first question --- Buffalo What is the name of this animal? //4 answers Moose Taurus Buffalo Deer
//second question --- Buffalo Elephants lives in...? //4 answers Ocean Mountains Caves Plains
//third question --- Buffalo Elephants mostly eat...? //4 answers Meat Fish Plants Insects
//fourth question --- Buffalo It is mostly known for? //4 answers Horns Size Stripes Riding
//fifth question --- Buffalo Which color can they also have? /4 answers Light Brown Red dark purple gray
